question: Question: The liquid drop model of this structure leads to the semi-empirical mass formula, which has terms for asymmetry and pairing energy. For 10 points each: [10] Name this structure discovered by Ernest Rutherford in his gold-foil experiment. They are held together by the strong force and are made up of protons and neutrons.
